ingredients.ingredient: 10 (4 ounce) links sausage (such as Eckrich® Smok-y Breakfast Sausage)

cookingTips: Cook sausage links first, then slice or crumble before assembling for even distribution
Broil or bake at high temperature just until cheese melts and edges are golden—watch carefully to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should I cook the sausage first or raw, and how do I prevent the saltines from getting too soggy?
